thread.title: In Transit: Mac & Cheese Fest in Chicago to Expand This Year
thread.title_full: In Transit: Mac & Cheese Fest in Chicago to Expand This Year

author: MATT BEARDMORE
title: In Transit: Mac & Cheese Fest in Chicago to Expand This Year
text: Mac & Cheese Fest in Chicago to Expand This Year JULY 27, 2015 See More » The response to last year’s inaugural festival was so positive — it sold out, with 2,500 attendees — that its organizers, Melinda Joseph and Cece Gonzales, have expanded the event to two sessions: lunch from noon to 3 p.m. and dinner from 7 to 10 p.m. More than 50 restaurants will participate in each session. Kitty O’Sheas will vie for a second Golden Noodle Award, which will go to the restaurant in each session with the winning recipe. Tickets are $60 per session and will be available Aug. 31 through macandcheesechicago.com or Ticketmaster. Entry (attendees must be at least 10 years old) includes all you can eat plus five drink tickets. A version of this article appears in print on July 26, 2015, on page TR3 of the New York edition with the headline: Cheese Whizzes. Order Reprints | Today's Paper | Subscribe Loading...
